artifacts.summary: Phase 2 analysis: S5 Box Invariance found to be mathematically false for arbitrary MCS

partial_progress.details: Phase 2 (S5 Box Invariance) is BLOCKED. The statement 'Box phi in M -> Box phi in M' for arbitrary MCS M, M'' is mathematically false (counterexample: Box(atom p) is independent of the proof system). Plan v006 requires revision. Phase 1 remains COMPLETED.

completion_data.completion_summary: Phase 2 analysis revealed that S5 Box Invariance as stated in plan v006 is mathematically false for arbitrary MCS pairs. Counterexample: Box(atom p) is consistent but not provable, so MCS exist both with and without Box(atom p). The plan conflated a property of the S5 canonical model (universal accessibility) with a property of arbitrary MCS (which don't satisfy it). Plan requires revision before Phase 2 can proceed.
